## directory.clear() function

delete the directory and recreate it to ensure it is free of items note: can only handle directories that only contain files and directories

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function clear(path: string): void;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | <code>string</code> |  |

`void`
